title: Subpart 56-11 - Special Projects Section
content:
Subpart 56-11 - Special Projects Section

State Regulations
§ 56-11.1 - In-plant operations
§ 56-11.2 - Emergency projects
§ 56-11.3 - Minor asbestos projects or minor size regulated abatement work area
§ 56-11.4 - Pre-demolition asbestos abatement projects
§ 56-11.5 - Controlled demolition with asbestos in place
§ 56-11.6 - Exterior project removal of non-friable acm roofing, siding, caulking, glazing compound, transite, tars, sealers, coatings, and other nob acms
§ 56-11.7 - Non-friable flooring and/or mastic removal
§ 56-11.8 - Abandoned pipe/duct/conduit wrap and cut removal

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
